transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir namaste.
Customer: Kaun?
Executive: Adla sir main IndiaMART office se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir ye apna catalog IndiaMART pe running hai SN trading company main thoda isko lekar ke baat karna chahta hu udhar ek beech maine aapko call kiya tha to 4 tarikh mein aap kiya tha sir lekin baat boliye kya kya dikkat hai.
Executive: Ji bilkul main ye kehna chah rahi thi sir ye jo catalog apna IndiaMART pe running hai kya isme time nahi de rahe sir buylead vagera use nahi kar rahe kya.
Customer: Haan use nahi kar raha hu abhi wo pura setup kar raha hu uske liye aadmi rakh raha hu ek alag se.
Executive: Achcha achcha to ye kitna time lag jayega sir man lijiye sab kuch settle hone mein.
Customer: Ek hafta to 15-20 din lagega bhai.
Executive: 15-20 din aur jo buyer ki calls aati hai wo main dekh rahi hu ki aap fir bhi respond karte hai lekin wo bhi call jyada miss ho raha hai sir abhi last month 28 aaya usme se 46% call aapne attend kiya yani almost aapne 11-12 call attend kiya baki sare miss ho gaye to jo calls aa rahi hai usse kya kuch buyer ka response rehta hai ki nahi rehta hai sir.
Customer: Rehta hai thoda bahut rehta hai.
Executive: Thoda bahut rehta hai is month bhi seven aayi hai jisme se almost teen aapne uthai hai baki miss ho gaye to matlab IndiaMART se overall satisfaction kaisa hai sir kya response vagera hai ya bilkul nahi hai sir.
Customer: Achcha hai lekin hum use nahi kar rahe hai na to uska bhi malum nahi hai actually mere buylead aur mera jo subscription hai totally waste ho raha hai.
Executive: Hmm okay to matlab kab reason kya bataya aapne na consume karne ke piche sir kya stock nahi hai apne pass ya fir kya nahi hai manpower nahi hai kya.
Customer: Kabhi kabhi stock bhi nahi rehta hai manpower thoda kam hai.
Executive: Hmm to manpower kam hai stock nahi hai aur ye sab wholesale ka kam hai sir apna pura pan India level pe kam rehta hai.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Pura pan India level pe rehta hai to main dekh rahi hu ye kab se problem chal raha hai sir kyuki main to dekh rahi hu na ye almost year ho gaya ek saal se aapka consumption na ke barabar hai to use hi nahi kiya aapne to mane abhi aap ye keh rahe hai ki ek hafte se use karenge.
Customer: Ye ek saal mera totally waste ho gaya na.
Executive: Haan ji iska subscription end kab hota hai.
Executive: Actually aapne sir humne lagta hai ki idhar aapne 2023 mein liya tha kya 2023 mein liya hua hai 2025 chal raha hai hai na to aapka jo hai jab aapne liya tha payment kiya tha service ko lekar ke to nahi kitne time se aap use nahi kar rahe hai main itna puchna chah rahi hu aap se.
Customer: Bahut time ho gaya wo to chodo dedh saal ke upar ho gaya rahega lekin mera subscription kab end hota hai ye.
Executive: Achcha so you have taken sir two year service na sir do saal ka.
Customer: Teen saal ka shayad mere khayal mein.
Executive: Hame to do saal show ho raha hai do saal ka hi hamesha aap le rahe hai pehle aap monthly service chalate the 2020 se December 2020 se you have taken monthly plan 3540 rupees ka fir idhar aapne isko trust seal mein convert kara liya August 2020 one mein September 2021 se 23 sir do saal ka hi plan tha ye apna.
Customer: Achcha to ye subscription kab end hone wala hai.
Executive: Ya November month sir this month.
Customer: Ye mahine ko khatam ho raha hai.
Executive: Haan two year complete na 2023 se 2025 do saal ka plan tha aapne aapne payment October mein karaya hai.
Customer: Aapka naam kya hai Smrita Smrita Singh.
Executive: Shweta Singh Shweta Singh.
Customer: Achcha ye mujhe subscription kidhar dikhta hai end hone wala hai setting mein.
Executive: Aap aap system pe online hai sir laptop hai mobile hai kidhar hai.
Customer: Laptop mein online hu.
Executive: Laptop mein online hai to dekho sir isme aapko batati hu details let me check sir first let me check.
Executive: Ab main aapka pehle account khol leti hu payment invoice December 2020 mein monthly service hai fir idhar aap 2021 mein isko trust seal liya hai do saal ka 2023 2023 17 October ko aapne payment process kiya hai 46200 achcha part payment kara September mein bhi shayad aapne payment karwaya hai.
Executive: Part payment karwaya tha sir do part mein payment liya tha.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Hai na ha nahi nahi sorry sorry I am really sorry aapki service three years ki hai sir hai na three years ki hai to aapka catalog let me tell you aapka catalog ka jo expiry hoga October 2026 sir not this year next year sir October mein.
Customer: Theek hai okay madam main ispe ispe kam karunga abhi next week se 10 ek 10 din mein.
Executive: 100% sir ek bar ek kam kijiye mera ye number aap save kariye sir listen to me aap mera ye number save kariye sir theek hai jab bhi aap lagta hai ki aapke pass time hai aap consume kar sakte hai leads thoda ek bar mere se baat kare sir main thoda explain karna chahti hu ki kaise kam karte hai kaise leads follow karna hai kis tarike ki leads dekhni hai aur kyuki bahut time se pending hai na sir kyuki calls vagera bhi bahut miss ho raha hai leads bhi aapne use nahi kiya to mujhe thoda sa aapka purchase pattern bhi set karna padega aapke products dekhne padenge kis tarike ki leads aap chahte hai kis tarike ki nahi chahte us hisab se mujhe products bhi update karne honge to ek hafte baad hum baat karte hai theek hai thoda sa isko samajhte hai catalog ko ki kya hai kya nahi hai fir usko us hisab se kam karte hai us pe theek hai to main aapko main abhi aaj sixth hai main udhar next week call karu kya sir Wednesday Thursday tak theek hai Wednesday Thursday tak aapko call karti hu discuss karte hai isko aur is pe kam karte hai sir theek hai aur aapka ek ticket raise hua tha sir kyuki maine call kiya tha udhar beech mein to shayad aapne dobara mujhe call back kiya tha to call miss ho gayi thi to ek ticket khul gayi kya main wo ticket band kar sakti hu sir.
Customer: Ji ji band kar do.
Executive: Theek hai aap se request hai na ek bar please us pe positive feedback dijiyega hamare discussion ke base pe aur rest jo hai main appointment schedule karke next week aap se baat karti hu theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay thank you.
Executive: Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not using buyleads.

- Customer's subscription is being wasted.

- Customer is missing buyer calls.

- Customer wants to know subscription end date.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed subscription expiry date is October 2026.

- Executive offered to explain how to use leads.

- Executive requested positive feedback on the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call next week to discuss further.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, expiry, feedback, calls
